file_content.text: Determined to spoil my fun, aren't you? Now I have to set up new power stations where you can't reach.
At most, you've bought yourself a few hours. Proud of yourself?
What you're doing is twisted, even for Sith.
Very.
I enjoy life's simple pleasures. Don't judge me.
We know about your spy. We'll capture Aleyna and the Death Mark targeting device.
I'm going to find Aleyna.
Well, I suggest you hurry. Tick, tick, tick....
Don't count on killing anyone else. You'll be dead soon.
You won't get a second shot.
Promises, promises.
Well, well. The Jedi who killed Tarnis back on Coruscant.
I'd rather if you didn't shut down my laser's power stations. I need them.
I have so many targets waiting to be vaporized. Who's next... the farm girl or the old colonel?
Even Sith don't murder random people.
Stop this madness.
You're missing the point. Imagine the terror spreading among Alderaan's people as death rains upon them.
Farm girl? Colonel? What are you talking about?
Who?
I've randomly targeted dozens of Alderaanians, from all walks of life. It felt... democratic.
Point the laser at yourself and put us out of your misery.
I have a better suggestion.
Really, that's just rude.
Oh, dear. I'm afraid the farm girl didn't make it. I wonder how long the old colonel will survive?
I can kill anyone I like, and there's nothing you can do about it. Have a lovely day.
You'll regret entering my domain.
